meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1884.

td.p: Robert Slaven, an office automation specialist from Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, Canada
Richard Kaplan, a retired attorney from Los Angeles, California
John Kelly, a retired military Air Force officer from Austin, Texas

tr.td: ANIMALS
LACROSSE
BROADWAY
PEOPLE
AWARDS
15-LETTER WORDS

tr.td: John
Richard

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '[Richard\'s response is so bunched together at the end that it is unclear whether he actually completed writing it or whether he only wrote "Paderesk". It might have been that the "k" and "i" were overlapped.]
(Alex: [To Richard] I think we can make out enough of it there for a correct response? Yes.)
RobertWho was Paderewski?
$5,500
RichardWho was Padereski
$5,000
JohnWho was Kosciusko?
$4,801
Jan Paderewski')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'Laid to rest temporarily at Arlington in 1941, his remains were returned to Poland in 1992')

tr.td: POLAND
Laid to rest temporarily at Arlington in 1941, his remains were returned to Poland in 1992
